index.title: Java Fundamentals
index.excerpt: Object-oriented, platform-independent programming language. JVM, bytecode, garbage collection, collections framework and Stream API.

index.title: Object-Oriented Programming

index.title: Spring Framework
index.excerpt: Dependency injection, Spring Boot, REST APIs, Spring Data JPA, Spring Security. Enterprise Java development framework.

index.title: SQL & Database
index.excerpt: Relational databases, SQL queries, JOINs, indexing, transactions, normalization. Database design and optimization.

index.title: Web Development
index.excerpt: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, HTTP protocol, REST APIs, modern web frameworks and tools.

index.title: Frontend Development
index.excerpt: React, TypeScript, component architecture, state management, modern frontend development tools and practices.

index.title: Algorithms & Data Structures
index.excerpt: Classic algorithms, complexity analysis, data structures, problem solving techniques for technical interviews.

index.title: Software Testing
index.excerpt: Unit testing, TDD, mocking, integration testing, test coverage and testing best practices.

index.title: DevOps & CI/CD
index.excerpt: Docker, Kubernetes, CI/CD pipelines, deployment strategies, monitoring and infrastructure automation.

index.title: Software Architecture
index.excerpt: Design patterns, microservices, system design, scalability, architectural principles and best practices.

index.title: Git & Version Control
index.excerpt: Git commands, branching strategies, merge conflicts, collaboration workflows and version control best practices.
